code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input  logic clock,
    input  logic a,
    output logic p,
    output logic q
);
    logic state;
    logic next_state;

    always @(posedge clock) begin
        state <= next_state;
    end

    always @(*) begin
        next_state = state; // Default to hold state
        p = 1'b0; // Default value
        q = 1'b0; // Default value
        case (state)
            1'b0: begin
                if (a) next_state = 1'b1;
            end
            1'b1: begin
                p = a;
                next_state = a ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
            end
        endcase
    end
endmodule
```
[DONE]
